text: yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tuhillu shaʿaira l-lahi wala l-shahra l-harama wala l-hadya wala l-qalaida wala ammina l-bayta l-harama yabtaghuna fadlan min rabbihim warid'wanan wa-idha halaltum fa-is'tadu wala yajrimannakum shanaanu qawmin an saddukum ʿani l-masjidi l-harami an taʿtadu wataʿawanu ʿala l-biri wal-taqwa wala taʿawanu ʿala l-ith'mi wal-ʿud'wani wa-ittaqu l-laha inna l-laha shadidu l-ʿiqabi
